thread.section_title: Travelopod Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Travelopod | travelopod.com | 2 of 100
thread.title: Douglas E. Sprayberry
thread.title_full: Travelopod reviewed by Douglas E. Sprayberry

author: Douglas E. Sprayberry
title: Douglas E. Sprayberry
text: I own several small businesses traveling often and just found Travelopod to be fantastic! I was trying to book an international flight online for my son and I to New Zealand that did not go through and I was contacted by phone immediately by the best travel agent ever (Sienna Miles) to help me complete the transaction! Though we were disconnected 3-4 times during the process (my poor cell service I believe), she always called me back right away and assisted with my special request (1 RT and 1 one way ticket) along with the shortest flight and best price available! If I were not planning to retire next year, I would likely try to recruit Sienna as my personal assistant...she was unbelievable!!! Thanks Sienna!!!
